item.title: Cars parking on pavement, 21st February
item.description:
Cars deiving over the public footpath on to the grassed area ang parking theor cars on the public footpath. A bollard was erected to stop this but they are niw driving over grass to bye pass the bollard. Unsafe for walkers. Address is 139 casterbridge road se3

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Casterbridge Road, Blackheath

item.title: Very dangerous unit on public service road, 21st February
item.description:
There has been several Lorrie’s entering the service road behind the high street, this service road has a brewery at the end which has a lot of public including children. A lorry has clearly hit the air con unit and not reported it !! It in a very dangerous condition. The owners of the shop have beck informed and they seemed to not be interested . Please enforce this as someone is going to get hurt.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 119 - 121, High Street, Penge, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bar on Rivington St always blocking sidewalk, 21st February
item.description:
I cycle there twice a day and there is not a day where the (already extremely narrow) sidewalk is blocked by a pile of fences and other items. It’s really not occasional so would be really worth solving this since it gets really busy with pedestrians

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Rivington Street, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Smashed keep left sign loose on traffic island, 21st February
item.description:
The traffic island that often gets struck by vehicles at the junction of Bexley Lane and London Road has a damaged keep-left bollard lying flat in the middle of it. If it gets knocked again, it will probably spin on to the carriageway.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): London Road, Crayford, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
